creatures

Class Creature

  • java.lang.Object
    • creatures.Creature
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Gomple, Human, Humple

    public abstract class Creature
extends java.lang.Object
    abstract class that sets up the characteristics for different creatures

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Creature(java.lang.String name)
      constructor to set name, isAlive to true, isSick to false, and make the creature's health to 70
